en.full: Recrystallize contents of {vessel} {solvent} heating to {crystallize_temp} and waiting for {time}

Recrystallize (without solvent).en: Recrystallize contents of {vessel} by heating to {crystallize_temp} and waiting for {time}.
Recrystallize (without solvent).ru: Перекристаллизовать содержимое {vessel} нагревая/охлаждая до температуры {crystallize_temp} в течение {time}.

Recrystallize (with solvent).en: Recrystallize contents of {vessel} by dissolving in {solvent} ({solvent_volume}) at {dissolve_temp} then heating to {crystallize_temp} and waiting for {time}.
Recrystallize (with solvent).ru: Перекристаллизовать содержимое {vessel} растворив осадок в {solvent} ({solvent_volume}) при температурe {dissolve_temp} и охлаждая до температуры {crystallize_temp} в течение {time}.
